ChunkText: students who upload a draft i-765 with the incorrect format will need to re-upload it in the correct format. isss will review each students OPT request and send an email if anything is missing. once approved, students will receive an I-20 with the OPT recommendation listed on the second page.
ContextBefore: the OPT start date can be any date within the 60 days after the I-20 program end date. please refer to the table andor graphic above to choose an OPT start date. second, students will need to upload a draft i-765. students should download a draft i-765 by clicking view draft snapshot in their online uscis account.
ContextAfter: the I-20 should list OPT requested on the second page, with requested start and end dates. please contact us if anything needs to be corrected.
